resources.string:
This application requires the following permissions to work properly
 - Access to camera (obviously)
 - Notifications (optional) : used to notify when photos are ready to be developed
 - storage (mandatory) : required to store undeveloped and developed photos
 

 No personal data are collected and transferred outside of this phone
Type a number and a duration (minute, hour, day, month, year)\\n\nEx: \"5 months\" for 5 months delay
Type a number to set the maximum number of shots allowed per days
